DialogueNodes.Text: Hello dear, you must be Hans sister, he's told me all about you.

Responses.Text: What have you done to my brother?

DialogueNodes.Text: Oh I haven't done anything to your brother, darling.

Responses.Text: So you'll let us leave then??

DialogueNodes.Text: Of course. I'd be delighted to help you leave. There is just one small problem, perhaps you could help me first?
My darling little pet lives just upstairs. But the door to his enclosure has jammed and I can't get in to feed him!!!! I've been worried sick about my poor little Rufus.

Responses.Text: so... what exactly do you need me to do?

DialogueNodes.Text: There is a small pipe that can take you to the back entrance if you go up the stairs and crawl through a pipe. Sadly I'm too tall to fit, but a young girl like yourself should easily squeeze in

Responses.Text: I go in there and give your pet some food? That's it?

DialogueNodes.Text: Yes! Do that for me and I'll show you the way out. I'll unlock the doorway.

Responses.Text: Alright, I guess can do that...

DialogueNodes.Text: Thank you darling, he really is to die for my little Rufus. I'm sure you'll love him. Now of you go! [Daphne marches off before you even have the chance to ask what kind of food 'Rufus' eats]
